Name: Summer Weekend
About the game: Summer Weekend is a visual novel exclusively for adults! In this game you will be told the story of two hot lesbians who came to the beach to sunbathe. But instead they had sex... The game is filled with sex scenes, humor and romance. In this wonderful game you have to plunge into the story of two lesbians who arrived at the beach to sunbathe. Barbara and Mindy are two very good friends. They came to the beach to sunbathe. But Barbara had other thoughts on this matter... You will see what happened next in the game. Get real pleasure from a very simple gameplay and cool music. Beautiful graphics! Relaxing music! Exciting sex scenes!
